main event: A civilian observed two constant white lights and a flickering orange light in the sky moving at airplane speed in Richmond, Indiana.
interesting points: The lights were sighted low on the horizon and moved in a western direction., The observer mentioned that the lights were approximately one foot apart., The sighting lasted for about 2 to 3 minutes., The observer reported no sound from the lights., The phenomenon rapidly changed direction and eventually disappeared from view.
sighted object: two white lights with a flickering orange light in between
